attributes.action: Cease all housing developments in inappropriate locations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Inappropriate locations include in the so-called Thames gateway where at present the supporting infrastructure is inadequate, and "intensification" of existing housing density is undesirable.  Furthermore much housing is planned for the flood-plane.

Other such places are gardens to older houses, allotments, and other open, but urban spaces, all of which contribute to the pleasant "look and feel" of the present United Kingdom - well known for its rose and cottage gardens, and well-tended private gardens.
